subject: Theater
Boxing
lead_paragraph: At 90, Jake LaMotta, the former boxer known to many as the Raging Bull, has ended a two-week run in a biographical Off Broadway show, unfazed by savage reviews.
snippet: At 90, Jake LaMotta, the former boxer known to many as the Raging Bull, has ended a two-week run in a biographical Off Broadway show, unfazed by savage reviews.
